sentences.en: Ammonia has a pungent, penetrating odor.
sentences.cn: 氨具有一种强烈的刺鼻的气味.

sentences.en: He exhaled the pungent odor of garlic.
sentences.cn: 他散发出刺鼻的大蒜味.

sentences.en: He expressed some fairly pungent criticisms.
sentences.cn: 他提出了一针见血的批评。

sentences.en: Nearby was a factory which exuded a pungent smell.
sentences.cn: 旁边是一家散发出刺鼻气味的工厂。

sentences.en: The article is written in a pungent style.
The leaves of the huge cherry trees threw off a certain pungent aroma.
sentences.cn: 那两棵高大的樱桃树叶发出一种扑鼻的香味.

sentences.en: The moist pungent perfume lay all the way up to Mr. Alleyne's room.
sentences.cn: 浓郁温馨的香味一路飘到艾莱恩先生的办公室.

sentences.en: The more herbs you use, the more pungent the sauce will be.
sentences.cn: 用的香草越多，调味汁的味道就越浓烈。

sentences.en: the pungent smell of burning rubber
The pungent, choking smell of sulphur filled the air.
sentences.cn: 空气中弥漫着刺鼻呛人的硫磺气味.

sentences.en: The taste is bitter and disagreeably pungent.
They quarreled at a public meeting, and afterwards exchanged some pungent letters in the newspapers.
sentences.cn: 他们在一次大会上争吵, 过后又在报纸上互写措辞尖刻的话.

sentences.en: They quarrelled at a public meeting, and afterwards exchanged some pungent letters in the newspapers.
sentences.cn: 他们在一次大会上争吵, 过后又在报纸上互写措辞尖刻的信件.

sentences.en: This is an acrid and pungent substance.
sentences.cn: 这是一种辛辣而带刺激性的物质.

sentences.en: This is the pungent and original argument.
sentences.cn: 这就是那尖锐而有独到之处的论点.

sentences.en: Yet it breeds antipathies of the most pungent character between those who lay the emphasis differently.
sentences.cn: 然而,由于个人的着重点不同,彼此之间就产生了许多非常尖锐的嫌恶感.

trans.tran_cn: 辛辣的，刺激性的，苦痛的，尖刻的
trans.tran_en: having a strong taste or smell
